comments.body:
As far as I know, dailies always consist of 4 pvp, 4 wvw and 4 pve achievements.

But when I get the JSON from /achievements/daily, there are 7 pve achievements.
- 1 lumberjack
- 2 panoramas
- 2 events
- 2 jumping puzzles

Logically, I would assume, that players randomly get one of the two possiblities for each type (panorama, event, …) assigned. But I could not prove when I asked in the ingame chat.

I am confused. Is this really the case? And is there a pattern?
